name: GlitchGun
description:
a game for  Billy's Basement Game Jam 2021

What It's About:

The glitch is incoming, it's following the player... Run! And Shoot with your GlitchGun to get yourself through all the levels.

Test your skills with the Speedrun mode, and explore all the possibilities of this game in the Explore level!

Commands:

[A] [D]  ->  Move

[Space] ->  Jump

[Left Mouse] ->  Shoot

[E] -> PickUp Weapons

Speedrunner mode:

Run as fast as you can while a big glitch is moving through the screen.

Difficulties:

Easy -> There is no glitch following you

Normal -> There is a glitch that follows you with increasing speed

Difficult -> If you die you start from the beginning

Explore mode:

Collect all 4 keys to be able to open the door that leads you to freedom.
